title: Anchoring temporal convolutional networks for epileptic seizure prediction
details: S Rao, M Liu, Y Huang, H Yang, J Liang, J Lu, Y Niu… - Journal of Neural …, 2024
abstract: Objective. Accurate and timely prediction of epileptic seizures is crucial for empowering patients to mitigate their impact or prevent them altogether. Current studies predominantly focus on short-term seizure predictions, which causes the …
